CustomField.description: External fixed-fee cost associated with Milestone, not including any costs associated with child Timecards and Expenses. This is intended to be used when the vendor cost incurred in fulfilling the Milestone is itself fixed-fee, and thus not captured in Timecards/Expenses. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: External fixed-fee cost associated with Milestone, not including any costs associated with child Timecards and Expenses. Defaults to and must always be same currency as Project.
CustomField.label: Milestone Cost
